overview:
Howard Huang is the CEO & Founder of an online Indie Music Community for Fans and Artists; MadeLoud.

MadeLoud.com helps new up and coming indie artists effectively promote songs to thousands of indie fans that are searching for new music. Artists are able to schedule and target their songs to specific music genres. They are able to promote their song for a week or for a day. New promotion features will be added overtime.

Music fans are able to find and download free music legally. Fans can browse and search bands that they like by connecting with Facebook. Thousands of songs are streamed and downloaded for free daily.

Howard Huang can be found promoting things that help people, especially things that involve music.
